value.value:
Khir ganga trek is one of the amazing weekend trek which
can be covered over weekend from Delhi. Kheerganga trek a
perfect picturesque weekend trek if you are looking to relax in
mountains. Khir ganga Trek lies at an altitude of 13000 ft. near
Tosh Village in Parvati Valley of Kullu District of Himachal
Pradesh. Khir Ganga is a holy place
with a hot water spring, small
temple of Lord Shiva and a bathing
tank. It make a rare combination
for any trekker to bath in hot
spring water when everything is
covered by snow.

value.heading: Day 1
value.value:
Arrive at Manikaran (Kasol) by 8.00 am and arrive Barshani at
9:30 am. Start trek to Khir Ganga. The total trek length is 11 KM
and it will take 4-5 hrs to reach Khir Ganga.Khir Ganga is alpine
pasture.. After reaching delicious snacks will be serverd with
hot Tea. Sun set will provide a magical view. Overnight stay in
camp.

value.heading: Day 2
value.value:
From khir ganga one can get a terrific view of the Himalaya.
There is also a hot water spring also. Khir ganga is the part of
pir panjal range. and after healty breakfast trek back to
Barshani(11K.m.). And then return back to Manikaran.
Kheerganga trek is one such trek which you wish remains a
hidden treasure only for you. Kheerganga trek a perfect
picturesque weekend trek with natural hot water springs and
cold water streams. Kheerganga Trek lies at an altitude of 13000
ft. near Tosh Village in Parvati Valley of Kullu District of
Himachal Pradesh. But it’s no more a secret and backpackers,
trekkers and thrill seekers often go for this trek in the
Himalayas. Barshaini serves as the base for this trek. Trek for
Kheerganga starts from here.

details.heading: Meals
details.value:
• 2 breakfast 1 Lunch 1 Dinner
  • A lot of emphasis is given to nutritional needs and a menu of vegetarian dishes is prepared accordingly.
  • Tea/coffee will be served throughout.
  • Refreshments (2 refreshments maggi + soup)

details.heading: Other Inclusion
details.value:
• High quality trekking equipment’s (Tents, Mattress, Sleeping bags)
  • Camping stools Aid, Medical Kit, First Aid Kit
  • Forest Permits/Camping Charges
  • Trek guide
  • Bonfire

details.heading: Transport
details.value: Toyota Innova, Mahindra Xylo, Mahindra Scorpio, Tempo Traveller and no local jeeps or similar vehicles are used except where there are short transfers from the lodge to the trek points. The transport tariff includes all driver charges, fuel, parking, toll and taxes.

details.heading: Things To Carry
details.value:
• A sturdy backpack (60ltrs) with a plastic or water-proof lining
  • High-ankle waterproof (Goretex)trekking shoes with good grip
  • Trekking pole or stick
  • Wardrobe essentials like woollen and fleece clothes, synthetic or waterproof track pants, rain-proof jackets, sunglasses, waterproof gloves, wind-proof jackets, thermal innerwear
  • Moisturizer, Sun Screen Lotion, Lip Balm
  • Personal Medicine Kit
  • Insulated water bottle and hydration pack (optional)
  • Torch / Flashlight (with extra batteries)
  • Extra Polythene bags

details.heading: Clothing
details.value:
• 1 pair of thermals (upper + lower)
  • 2 pairs of Quick Dry Warm lower or Track Pants.
  • Full sleeves T-shirts/ Sweatshirts.
  • 2-3 pair of socks
  • Undergarments. Qty - 1 for every day of trekking
  • 1 warm/feather jacket
  • Gloves and head cover

details.heading: Advisory
details.value:
• Travel in small groups
  • Proper waste disposal
  • Respect local cultures and be sensitive towards wildlife
  • Porter services for carrying personal belongings throughout the trek (not more than 10 kgs) are optional additions that can be availed for Rs. 800
  • Personal trekking gear and that can be availed at an additional cost
  • General precautions and steps are to be taken to initiate good acclimatization with the assistance of guides
  • Those suffering from an ailment or heart disease, Diabetes, breathing problems, high altitude sickness or is pregnant cannot participate in this trek

details.value:

value.value: 16 to 25 degrees (days) and 8 to 16 degrees (nights) during March, 14 to 22  degrees (days) and 6 to14 degrees (nights) between September and December
